name: Robotic Takeover (3D Platformer)
description:
Changes:

-Added a pet drone that follows you.

-A new pickup in level 1 that allows the drone to shoot at enemies (albeit,  at very low damage).

-Player now has a sword (blender-made )that is pretty strong.

-New obstacle: Lava, which kills you when touching it.

-New Enemies:

  • Patroling Chaser Bot (Level 1 Enemy): basically an attempt to integrate what I learned about AI, it follows a set collection of waypoints guarding the door and chases the player when they get too close.
  • Super Security guard (Level 1 Boss): Wields two shotguns, has a weak spot on the back
  • Robot Colonel (Level 2 Miniboss): basically chaser bot but bigger and stronger, holds a keycard for door
  • Spec Ops Blaster Trooper (Level 2 Miniboss): A miniature Super Security guard that only has 1 Shotgun, holds a keycard for door
  • Gunship Bot (Level 2 Boss): An over-sized flying bot with two turrets, the weak spot is right at the "cockpit"

-Different music when the player encounters the boss.

-Different skybox and a new prop: the Shuttle.

-Some more stuff.

Credits: UCI, Le Hong Nhat Minh
